Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

I'm currently writing a swift package for the Telemachus Websocket. The plan is to make an Telemachus Interface App for iOS / iPadOS (maybe even watch os xD)

The Project is completely Open-Source and I encourage anyone interested in App Development to utilize it, tell me about issues, tell me if they need more information on how to get started with the project.

 

GitHub Repo

Documentation

UPDATE:

I've put the source code to my iPad App on Github. If you want to try it out, here's the link:

GitHub Repo

I am not currently Enrolled into the Apple Developer Program so the app will (for now) not be available on TestFlight or in the AppStore but I am planning to get enrolled sometime in the next few months

Thanks,

Noah

Edited March 16, 2020 by noahk
